title: Update Hero to use newly uploaded static image

requirements.summary: Add the newly uploaded images as static assets and update the Hero section to display one of them instead of the previously referenced uploaded hero image.
acceptanceCriteria: Both files 683CEC41-3F5D-48A7-A96D-FC2FE9C2332B-2.png and 683CEC41-3F5D-48A7-A96D-FC2FE9C2332B-3.png are present in the built frontend bundle as static assets under the same public assets convention used for existing uploaded hero images (e.g., /assets/uploaded/...).
The Hero section at the top of the page renders one of the newly uploaded images as its background/cover image on initial page load.
The previous hero image reference (/assets/uploaded/683CEC41-3F5D-48A7-A96D-FC2FE9C2332B.png) is no longer used by the Hero component after this change.
No layout regressions: the Hero remains full-screen with the existing gradient overlay, title text, scroll indicator, and background audio player control still visible and functional.

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded image as a public static asset under the existing uploaded-assets convention so it is included in the built frontend bundle.
Add the uploaded image as a public static asset under the existing uploaded-assets convention so it is included in the built frontend bundle.

Update the Hero image src to use one of the newly uploaded images (either /assets/uploaded/683CEC41-3F5D-48A7-A96D-FC2FE9C2332B-2.png or /assets/uploaded/683CEC41-3F5D-48A7-A96D-FC2FE9C2332B-3.png) and remove usage of /assets/uploaded/683CEC41-3F5D-48A7-A96D-FC2FE9C2332B.png, preserving existing full-screen layout, gradient overlay, text, scroll indicator, and BackgroundAudioPlayer.
